name: A Violent Hexagon
description:
Play as an overly violent Hexagon, murdering all other shapes as you use your high score to unlock different cosmetics for your little killing machine.

With 4 different weapons and enemy variations, the camera slowly zooms in as the game gets more intense over time. 

This is my first (finished) project in Unity, and my only goal is to get something out to the world that's playable.
